item.description:
Join us from 4:30 - 6:45 PM in the bar area

Fire + Ice in Harvard Square has a colorful atmosphere and a creative culinary style, but have you ever been to their bar? Check out this selection:

Martinis
Enjoy a chilled classic with olives and a touch of vermouth or an exotic blend of new age flavors served chilled and straight up!
Cosmopolitan: A blend of Vodka, orange liquor, cranberry juice and fresh lime.
Pinktini: A perfect pink sensation with a mix of both raspberry vodka and raspberry rum with cranberry Juice and lemonade
Tiny Bubbles Martini: Citrus vodka mixed with peach liquor and Chambord shaken and served straight up, topped with champagne.

Shared Libations
A FiRE+iCE signature offering! These flavorful bowl drinks provide you with a delicious cocktail to share and enjoy.
iCE Bowl: A fruity infused sensation featuring citrus vodka, orange, lemon and coconut rum with blue orange liquor and white cranberry juice!
FiRE Bowl: An exceptional blend with Southern Comfort, Amaretto, and cranberry juice
Scorpion Bowl: A classic with a touch of FiCE! Our scorpion bowl features white and dark rum , gin, brandy and a unique blend of juices.

Margaritas
FiRE+iCE offers a wide variety of both classic margaritas and unforgettable infused creations.
Lemon Blueberry Margarita: A FiRE+iCE signature cocktail with our homemade infused lemon blueberry tequila.

Beer and Wine
FiRE+iCE offers draft and bottled imported and domestic beers, along with a selection of white and red wines. Selections vary per location.
FiRE+iCE Ale: A Boston style ale brewed by Sam Adams just for FiRE+iCE

Frozen Drinks
Indulge yourself with one of our frozen creations.
Lava Flow: Two classics brought together to make one phenomenal drink. Half Strawberry Daiquiri and Half Pina Colada.
Frozen Raspberry Lemonade: Raspberry rum, Chambord and lemonade blended to perfection.

Alcohol-free Specialties
FiRE+iCE also offers a number of delicious alcohol-free drinks such as:
Virgin Strawberry Daiquiri
Virgin Pina Colada
Virgin Lava Flow
Virgin Frozen Pink Lemonade
Smoothies: (Peach Mango, Wildberry and Strawberry Banana)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send out an email the day before the event with details for all those who RSVP "yes"
item.name: Sunday Afternoon Cocktails in Harvard Square
